casebody.data:
The INLAND UTILITIES COMPANY, a Corporation, v. J. R. GIDEON, Administrator of the ESTATE of James GIDEON, Deceased. No. 1349. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. March 6, 1936. Langdon H. Larwill, of Denver, Colo., for appellant. J. S. Vaught, of Albuquerque, N. M., for appellee.

Before LEWIS and PHILLIPS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on stipulation.
